{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Symbol |model = AP-5131 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -44000-WW |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AG216 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = H9PAP5131D |icid = 1549D-AP5131D |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 141610310000E |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel XScale;IXP425;EWIXP425ABDT; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = XScale |cpu1spd = 533 <!-- 266 / 400 / 533 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S29AL016J70TFI01; |flash1size = 2 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Samsung;K9F1208UOC-PIB0; |flash2size = 64 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Micron;MT48LC16M16A2-75; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Altima;AC101L; |eth3chip = Altima;AC101L; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:23:68 |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Linux;2.4.20;MontaVista 3.1
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = 48 |pwr_poe_amp = 0.25 |pwr_conn = 2-pin Molex
|serial = yes,, DE-9,, (19200,8,N,1),, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 2.4/5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Anadigics;AWL9924;;2; ,,, 1 To 4 Clock Buffer;IDT;ICS551;;1; ,,, True 3.0V to 5.5V RS-232 Transceivers;Sipex;SP3232E;;1; ,,, Programmable Spread Spectrum Clock Generator;Cypress;CY25100;;1; ,,, Hex Buffer with Open Drain Output;Texas Instruments;SN74LV07A;;1; ,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-AND Gate;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC08A;;1; ,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-OR Gate;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC32A;;1; ,,, Octal D-Type Flip Flops with Clear;Texas Instruments;SN74LV273A;;1; ,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-NAND Gate;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC00A;;1; ,,, Single N-Channel, Logic Level, PowerTrench MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS6680A;;2; |802dot11_protocols = abg
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = symbol |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Accton |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/07/2005 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0044S36EG |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Intersil;ISL3886;ISL, 3886IK, M0414F355; |rad1chip2 = Intersil;ISL3692;ISL3692IR, N0443<...>; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad2modif = Mini PCI |rad2chip1 = Intersil;ISL3886;ISL, 3886IK, M0414F355; |rad2chip2 = Intersil;ISL3692;ISL3692IR, N0443<...>; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The model noted for this device in the FCC docs is AP-5131-44000-WW.
*"141610310000E R02" is silkscreened on the wireless modules.
The modules appear to use [http://www.anadigics.com/products/view/awl9924 '''ANADIGICS''' AWL9924 dual-band power amplifiers].
==Links of Interest== :[http://www.michaelfmcnamara.com/files/Motorola%20AP5131%20Reference%20Guide.pdf Product Reference Guide]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
